Description:
Detects enumeration of local systeam accounts on MacOS

Author: Alejandro Ortuno, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Local System Accounts Discovery - MacOs
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%/id' or (process_path like '%/lsof' and command like '%-u%') or (process_path like '%/dscl' and (command like '%list%' and command like '%/users%')) or (process_path like '%/dscacheutil' and (command like '%-q%' and command like '%user%')) or command like '%'x:0:'%' or (process_path like '%/cat' and (command like '%/etc/passwd%' or command like '%/etc/sudoers%')))
